name: j o y s t i c k  c i t y
description:
Seeing this vintage Atari joystick in a local gamers store brought back a flood of memories. Afternoons spent playing Home Run, Bowling, breakout & so many more. We had a blast playing with our 2600.

This pic first came to me in a dream. I imagined I was standing on top of a massive joystick, looking down on the city far below. Just floating & opening my mind to possibilities. It was a nice dream. And joysticks still get me excited when I see them in a gaming store, or in my artist's imagination.
